learning_outcomes.description: Apply theory gained in MRES7001 & 7004 to conduct a research project using imaging.
Collect, analyse and organise information and convey that information clearly and fluently.
Analyse results and discuss them in relation to imaging.

assessments.task_description: Project proposal must include aim, justification, method, equipment and bibliography.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description: You will need to prepare a series of PowerPoint slides which you will be required to present orally to an audience of students and staff. Your oral presentation should outline the aim(s) of the project, existing knowledge, the approach you have taken, results, conclusions and what remains to be done. You will need to explain your technical achievements and put them into context. It is mandatory to attend the presentation session and contribute to audience questions to other students’ presentations. Failure to present your work orally will results in a fail grade regardless of whether you have submitted your presentation to Turniitin.
assessments.submission_guidelines: The PowerPoint ﾑslide showﾒ should be submitted via Turnitin on Blackboard.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.

assessments.task_description:
Should follow standard format:

-Introduction & literature review that finishes with aim & hypothesis

-Method

-Results

-Discussion & Imaging Portfolio

-Conclusion

-Bibliography
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.
